member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Assets.CuttingToolMeasurementSubTypes.PROTRUDING_LENGTH
member.summary: The dimension from the yz-plane to the furthest point of the tool item or adaptive item measured in the -X direction.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Assets.CuttingToolMeasurementSubTypes.WEIGHT
member.summary: The total weight of the cutting tool in grams. The force exerted by the mass of the cutting tool.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Assets.CuttingToolMeasurementSubTypes.FUNCTIONAL_LENGTH
member.summary: The distance from the gauge plane or from the end of the shank to the furthest point on the tool, if a gauge plane does not exist, to the cutting reference point determined by the main function of the tool. The CuttingTool functional length will be the length of the entire tool, not a single cutting item. Each CuttingItem can have an independent FunctionalLength represented in its measurements.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Assets.CuttingToolStatusTypes.NEW
member.summary: A new tool that has not been used or first use. Marks the start of the tool history.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Assets.CuttingToolStatusTypes.AVAILABLE
member.summary: Indicates the tool is available for use. If this is not present, the tool is currently not ready to be used

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Assets.CuttingToolStatusTypes.UNAVAILABLE
member.summary: Indicates the tool is unavailable for use in metal removal. If this is not present, the tool is currently not ready to be used

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Assets.CuttingToolStatusTypes.ALLOCATED
member.summary: Indicates if this tool is has been committed to a device for use and is not available for use in any other device. If this is not present, this tool has not been allocated for this device and can be used by another device

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Assets.CuttingToolStatusTypes.UNALLOCATED
member.summary: Indicates this Cutting Tool has not been committed to a process and can be allocated.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Assets.CuttingToolStatusTypes.MEASURED
member.summary: The tool has been measured.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Assets.CuttingToolStatusTypes.RECONDITIONED
member.summary: The cutting tool has been reconditioned. See ReconditionCount for the number of times this cutter has been reconditioned.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Assets.CuttingToolStatusTypes.USED
member.summary: The tool is in process and has remaining tool life.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Assets.CuttingToolStatusTypes.EXPIRED
member.summary: The cutting tool has reached the end of its useful life.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Assets.CuttingToolStatusTypes.BROKEN
member.summary: Premature tool failure.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Assets.CuttingToolStatusTypes.NOT_REGISTERED
member.summary: This cutting tool cannot be used until it is entered into the system.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Assets.CuttingToolStatusTypes.UNKNOWN
member.summary: The cutting tool is an indeterminate state. This is the default value.

member.name: T:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.DataItemAttributes

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.DataItemAttributes.ID
member.summary: The unique identifier for this element.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.DataItemAttributes.NAME
member.summary: The name of the data item.

member.summary:
The type of data being measured. Examples of types are:
POSITION
VELOCITY
ANGLE
BLOCK
ROTARY_VELOCITY

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.DataItemAttributes.CATEGORY
member.summary:
Specifies the kind of information provided by a data item. The available options are:
SAMPLE
EVENT
CONDITION

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.DataItemAttributes.UNITS
member.summary: The unit of measurement for the reported value of the data item.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.DataItemAttributes.SUB_TYPE
member.summary: A sub-categorization of the data item type. For example, the subType of POSITION can be ACTUAL or COMMANDED.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.DataItemAttributes.NATIVE_UNITS
member.summary: The native units of measurement for the reported value of the data item.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.DataItemAttributes.STATISTIC
member.summary:
Describes the type of statistical calculation performed on a series of data samples to provide the reported data value. Examples of statistic are:
AVERAGE
MINIMUM
MAXIMUM
ROOT_MEAN_SQUARE
RANGE
MEDIAN
MODE
STANDARD_DEVIATION

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.DataItemAttributes.REPRESENTATION
member.summary: Description of a means to interpret data consisting of multiple data points or as a single value.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.DataItemAttributes.NATIVE_SCALE
member.summary: The nativeUnits may not be scaled to directly represent the original measured value. nativeScale MAY be used to convert the reported value to represent the original measured value. As an example, the may be reported as GALLON/MINUTE. TH emeasured value may actually be in 1000 GALLON/MINUTE. The value of the reported data mAY be divided by the nativeScale to convert the reported value to its original measured value and units.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.DataItemAttributes.SIGNIFICANT_DIGITS
member.summary: The number of significant digits in the reported value.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.DataItemAttributes.COORDINATE_SYSTEM
member.summary:
For measured values relative to a coordinate system like POSITION, the coordinate system being used may be reported. The available values for coordinateSystem are:
WORK
MACHINE

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.DataItemAttributes.COMPOSITION_ID
member.summary: The identifier attribute of the element that the reported data is most closely associated.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.DataItemAttributes.SAMPLE_RATE
member.summary: The rate at which successive samples of a data item are recorded by a piece of equipment. is expressed in terms of samples per second. If the is smaller than one, the number can be represented as a floating point number. For example a rate 1 per 10 seconds would be 0.1.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.DataItemAttributes.DISCRETE
member.summary: An indication signifying whether each value reported for the Data Entity is significant and whether duplicate values are to be suppressed. true indicates that each update to the Data Entity’s value is significant and duplicate values MUST NOT be suppressed. false indicates that duplicated values MUST be suppressed.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.DataItemAttributes.COORDINATE_SYSTEM_ID_REF
member.summary: The associated context for the .

PARENT: This piece of equipment functions as a parent in the relationship with the associated piece of equipment.

PEER: This piece of equipment functions as a peer which provides equal functionality and capabilities in the relationship with the associated piece of equipment.

CRITICAL: The services or functions provided by the associated piece of equipment is required for the operation of this piece of equipment.
NONCRITICAL: The services or functions provided by the associated piece of equipment is not required for the operation of this piece of equipment.

member.summary: The unique identification of the Entry in the Definition. The description applies to all Entry observations having this key.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.EntryDefinitionAttributes.UNITS
member.summary: Same as DataItem units. See Section 7.2.2.5 - units Attribute for DataItem. Only valid for representation of DATA_SET.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.EntryDefinitionAttributes.TYPE
member.summary: Same as DataItem type. See Section 8 - Listing of Data Items.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.EntryDefinitionAttributes.SUB_TYPE
member.summary: Same as DataItem subType. See Section 8 - Listing of Data Items.

member.name: T:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.FilterAttributes
member.summary: Attributes available for the element.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.FilterAttributes.TYPE
member.summary: Sets the type of the element.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.MotionAttributes.ID
member.summary: The unique identifier for this element.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.MotionAttributes.PARENT_ID_REF
member.summary: A pointer to the id attribute of the parent Motion. The kinematic chain connects all components using the parent relations. All motion is connected to the motion of the parent.The first node in the chain will not have a parent.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.MotionAttributes.COORDINATE_SYSTEM_ID_REF
member.summary: The coordinate system within which the kinematic motion occurs.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.MotionAttributes.TYPE
member.summary: Describes the type of motion.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.MotionAttributes.ACTUATION
member.summary: Describes if this Component is actuated directly or indirectly as a result of other motion.

member.name: T:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.ReferenceAttributes
member.summary: Attributes available in the abstract Reference element in the MTConnect Response document.
member.remarks: See Part 2 Section 4.8 of the MTConnect specification.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.ReferenceAttributes.ID_REF
member.summary: A pointer to the id attribute of the implemented Reference target that contains the information to be associated with this XML element.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.ReferenceAttributes.NAME
member.summary: The optional name of the implemented Reference target. Only informative.

member.name: T:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.RelationshipAttributes
member.summary: Attributes of the abstract Relationship element
member.remarks: See Part 2 Section 9.2.1 of the MTConnect specification.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.RelationshipAttributes.ID
member.summary: The unique identifier for a Relationship element.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.RelationshipAttributes.NAME
member.summary: The name of an element or a piece of equipment.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.RelationshipAttributes.TYPE
member.summary: The type of either a structural element or a dataitem being measured.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.RelationshipAttributes.CRITICALITY
member.summary: Criticality

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.SolidModelAttributes.ID
member.summary: The unique identifier for this entity within the MTConnectDevices document.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.SolidModelAttributes.SOLID_MODEL_ID_REF
member.summary: The associated model file if an item reference is used.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.SolidModelAttributes.HREF
member.summary: The URL giving the location of the Solid Model. If not present, the model referenced in the solidModelIdRef is used.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.SolidModelAttributes.ITEM_REF
member.summary: The reference to the item within the model within the related geometry. A solidModelIdRef MUST be given.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.SolidModelAttributes.MEDIA_TYPE
member.summary: The format of the referenced document.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.SolidModelAttributes.COORDINATE_SYSTEM_ID_REF
member.summary: A reference to the coordinate system for this SolidModel.

member.name: T:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.SourceAttributes
member.summary: Attributes for the element.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.SourceAttributes.COMPONENT_ID
member.summary: The identifier attribute of the Component element that represents the physical part of a piece of equipment where the data represented by the DataItem element originated.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.SourceAttributes.COMPOSITION_ID
member.summary: The identifier attribute of the Composition element that represents the physical part of a piece of equipment where the data represented by the DataItem element originated.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.SourceAttributes.DATA_ITEM_ID
member.summary: The identifier attribute of the DataItem that represents the originally measured value of the data referenced by this data item.

member.name: T:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.SpecificationAttributes
member.summary: Attributes of the Specification element
member.remarks: See Part 2 Section 9.3.1.1 of the MTConnect specification.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.SpecificationAttributes.TYPE
member.summary: Same as .

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.SpecificationAttributes.SUB_TYPE
member.summary: Same as .

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.SpecificationAttributes.DATA_ITEM_ID_REF
member.summary: A reference to the id attribute of the DataItem associated with this element.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.SpecificationAttributes.UNITS
member.summary: Same as .

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.SpecificationAttributes.COMPOSITION_ID_REF
member.summary: A reference to the id attribute of the Composition associated with this element.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.SpecificationAttributes.NAME
member.summary: The name provides additional meaning and differentiates between Specifications. A name MUST exist when two Specifications have the same and within a Component.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.SpecificationAttributes.COORDINATE_SYSTEM_ID_REF
member.summary: References the CoordinateSystem for geometric Specification elements.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.SpecificationAttributes.ID
member.summary: The unique identifier for this Specification. The id attribute MUST be unique within the MTConnectDevices document.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Attributes.SpecificationAttributes.ORIGINATOR
member.summary: A reference to the creator of the Specification.

member.name: T:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.CategoryTypes
member.summary: Available options for the

member.name: T:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.AdaptersSubComponentTypes
member.summary: Adapters is a Component that organizes Adapter Components representing the connectivity state of the MTConnect Agent.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.AdaptersSubComponentTypes.ADAPTER
member.summary: Adapter is a Component representing the connectivity state of a data source for the MTConnect Agent.

member.name: T:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.AuxiliariesSubComponentTypes
member.summary: Sub-components of

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.AuxiliariesSubComponentTypes.AUTOMATIC_TOOL_CHANGER
member.summary: A tool delivery mechanism that moves tools between a ToolMagazine and a Spindle or a Turret. An AutomaticToolChanger may also transfer tools between a location outside of a piece of equipment and a ToolMagazine or Turret.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.AuxiliariesSubComponentTypes.BAR_FEEDER
member.summary: BarFeeder is an XML container that represents the information for a unit involved in delivering bar stock to a piece of equipment.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.AuxiliariesSubComponentTypes.DEPOSITION
member.summary: Deposition is an XML container that represents the information for a system that manages the addition of material or state change of material being performed in an additive manufacturing process. For example, this could describe the portion of a piece of equipment that manages a material extrusion process or a vat polymerization process.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.AuxiliariesSubComponentTypes.ENVIRONMENTAL
member.summary: Environmental is an XML container that represents the information for a unit or function involved in monitoring, managing, or conditioning the environment around or within a piece of equipment.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.AuxiliariesSubComponentTypes.GANG_TOOL_BAR
member.summary: A tool mounting mechanism that holds any number of tools. Tools are located in STATIONs. Tools are positioned for use in the manufacturing process by linearly positioning the GangToolBar.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.AuxiliariesSubComponentTypes.LOADER
member.summary: Loader is an XML container that represents the information for a unit comprised of all the parts involved in moving and distributing materials, parts, tooling, and other items to or from a piece of equipment.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.AuxiliariesSubComponentTypes.SENSOR
member.summary: Sensor is a XML container that represents the information for a piece of equipment that responds to a physical stimulus and transmits a resulting impulse or value from a sensing unit.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.AuxiliariesSubComponentTypes.TOOL_MAGAZINE
member.summary: A tool storage mechanism that holds any number of tools. Tools are located in POTs. POTs are moved into position to transfer tools into or out of the ToolMagazine by an AutomaticToolChanger.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.AuxiliariesSubComponentTypes.TOOL_RACK
member.summary: A linear or matrixed tool storage mechanism that holds any number of tools. Tools are located in STATIONs.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.AuxiliariesSubComponentTypes.TOOLING_DELIVERY
member.summary: ToolingDelivery is an XML container that represents the information for a unit involved in managing, positioning, storing, and delivering tooling within a piece of equipment.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.AuxiliariesSubComponentTypes.TURRET
member.summary: A tool mounting mechanism that holds any number of tools. Tools are located in STATIONs . Tools are positioned for use in the manufacturing process by rotating the Turret.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.AuxiliariesSubComponentTypes.WASTE_DISPOSAL
member.summary: WasteDisposal is an XML container that represents the information for a unit comprised of all the parts involved in removing manufacturing byproducts from a piece of equipment.

member.name: T:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.AxesSubComponentTypes
member.summary: Sub-components of

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.AxesSubComponentTypes.CHUCK
member.summary: Chuck represents a mechanism that holds a part or stock material in place. It may also represent a mechanism that holds any other item in place within a device. The operation of a Chuck is represented by Chuck_State. The value of Chuck_State MAY be OPEN, CLOSED, or UNLATCHED.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.AxesSubComponentTypes.LINEAR
member.summary: A linear axis represents travel along a straight line. The name of the linear axis SHOULD follow the conventions of the industry.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.AxesSubComponentTypes.ROTARY
member.summary: A rotary axis revolves around a line or vector.

member.name: T:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.ComponentTypes
member.summary: Types of Components defined in the MTConnect Standard

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.ComponentTypes.ACTUATOR
member.summary: A mechanical device for moving or controlling a mechanism or system.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.ComponentTypes.ADAPTERS
member.summary: Adapters is a Component that organizes Adapter Components representing the connectivity state of the MTConnect Agent.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.ComponentTypes.AUXILIARIES
member.summary: An XML container used to organize information for Lower Leve elements representing functional sub-systems that provide supplementary or extended capabilities for a piece of equipment, but they are not required for the basic operation of the equipment.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.ComponentTypes.AXES
member.summary: The Axes component is a container for the actual axes of which there are currently two types: Linear and Rotary.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.ComponentTypes.CONTROLLER
member.summary: The Controller component is the Component that controls a device, executes a program, and sends instructions to the other components of the machine. It is the brains of the machine and can be asked for its current execution state and program name.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.ComponentTypes.DOOR
member.summary: A opening that can be closed.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.ComponentTypes.INTERFACES
member.summary: The information used to coordinate actions and activity between devices or sub-systems and a device.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.ComponentTypes.PART_OCCURANCE
member.summary: PartOccurrence organizes information about a specific part as it exists at a specific place and time, such as a specific instance of a bracket at a specific timestamp.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.ComponentTypes.PROCESS_OCCURANCE
member.summary: ProcessOccurrence organizes information about the execution of a specific process that takes place at a specific place and time, such as a specific instance of part-milling occurring at a specific timestamp.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.ComponentTypes.PRESSURE
member.summary: A sensor capable of measuring the pressure.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.ComponentTypes.THERMOSTAT
member.summary: A sensor capable of measuring the temperature of a component. The temperature is always given in Celsius.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.ComponentTypes.RESOURCES
member.summary: An XML container used to organize information for Lower Leve elements representing types of items, materials, and personnel that support the operation of a piece of equipment or work to be performed at a location. Resources also represents materials or other items consumed or transformed by a piece of equipment for production of parts or other types of goods.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.ComponentTypes.SENSOR
member.summary: Sensor is a component that may or may not be integral to a parent component or device. When Sensor is not integral to a parent device or component – it can function as a device. Sensor data MUST be associated with its most relevant Component and MUST be represented as a DataItem for that Component.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.ComponentTypes.SPINDLE
member.summary: The spindle is a rotational axis that revolves at high speed and has its speed expressed in REVOLUTION/MINUTE. The spindle can also have additional data items. Spindle speed has been specified as a separate data item since it receives special treatment in many applications. Velocity is used for linear axes other than spindle.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.ComponentTypes.STOCK
member.summary:
Stock is a Structural Element that represents the material that is used in a manufacturing process and to which work is applied in a machine or piece of equipment to produce parts.
Stock may be either a continuous piece of material from which multiple parts may be produced or it may be a discrete piece of material that will produce a part or a set of parts.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.ComponentTypes.STRUCTURE
member.summary: Structure is a Component that organizes the parts comprising the rigid bodies of the piece of equipment.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.ComponentTypes.SYSTEMS
member.summary: The Systems component is a place holder for all the system types.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.ComponentTypes.VIBRATION
member.summary: A sensor capable of measuring the vibration of a component.

member.name: T:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.ControllerSubComponentTypes
member.summary: Sub-components of

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.ControllerSubComponentTypes.PATH
member.summary: A Path represents the motion of a control point as it moves through space as controlled by a set of control instructions (i.e. vector move). When Path is not defined, DataItems relative to the Path MAY be reported for the Controller.

member.name: T:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.ResourcesSubComponentTypes
member.summary: Sub-components of

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.ResourcesSubComponentTypes.MATERIALS
member.summary: Materials is an XML container that provides information about materials or other items consumed or used by the piece of equipment for production of parts, materials, or other types of goods. Materials also represents parts or part stock that are present at a piece of equipment or location to which work is applied to transform the part or stock material into a more finished state.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.ResourcesSubComponentTypes.PERSONNEL
member.summary: Personnel is an XML container that provides information about an individual or individuals who either control, support, or otherwise interface with a piece of equipment.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.ResourcesSubComponentTypes.STOCK
member.summary: Stock is an XML container that represents the information for the material that is used in a manufacturing process and to which work is applied in a machine or piece of equipment to produce parts.

member.name: T:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.StructureSubComponentTypes
member.summary: Structure is a Component that organizes the parts comprising the rigid bodies of the piece of equipment.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.StructureSubComponentTypes.LINK
member.summary: Link is a structural Component providing a connection between Components.

member.name: T:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.SystemsSubComponentTypes
member.summary: Sub-components of

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.SystemsSubComponentTypes.COOLANT
member.summary: A Component representing the coolant and coolant distribution system of a device.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.SystemsSubComponentTypes.COOLING
member.summary: Cooling is a system used to to extract controlled amounts of heat to achieve a target temperature at a specified cooling rate.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.SystemsSubComponentTypes.DIELECTRIC
member.summary: Dielectric is an XML container that represents the information for a system that manages a chemical mixture used in a manufacturing process being performed at that piece of equipment. For example, this could describe the dielectric system for an EDM process or the chemical bath used in a plating process.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.SystemsSubComponentTypes.ELECTRIC
member.summary: A Component representing the electrical supply for a device.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.SystemsSubComponentTypes.ENCLOSURE
member.summary: Enclosure is an XML container that represents the information for a structure used to contain or isolate a piece of equipment or area. The Enclosure system may provide information regarding access to the internal components of a piece of equipment or the conditions within the enclosure.For example, Door may be defined as a Lower Level Component or Composition element of the Enclosure system.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.SystemsSubComponentTypes.END_EFFECTOR
member.summary: EndEffector is an XML container that represents the information for those functions that form the last link segment of a piece of equipment. It is the part of a piece of equipment that interacts with the manufacturing process.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.SystemsSubComponentTypes.FEEDER
member.summary: Feeder is an XML container that represents the information for a system that manages the delivery of materials within a piece of equipment. For example, this could describe the wire delivery system for an EDM or welding process; conveying system or pump and valve system distributing material to a blending station; or a fuel delivery system feeding a furnace.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.SystemsSubComponentTypes.HEATING
member.summary: Heating is a system used to deliver controlled amounts of heat to achieve a target temperature at a specified heating rate.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.SystemsSubComponentTypes.HYDRAULIC
member.summary: A component representing the hydraulics and hydraulic distribution system of a device.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.SystemsSubComponentTypes.LUBRICATION
member.summary: A Component representing the lubricant and lubrication distribution system of a device.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.SystemsSubComponentTypes.PNEUMATIC
member.summary: A component representing the pneumatics and compressed air distribution system of a device.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.SystemsSubComponentTypes.PRESSURE
member.summary: Pressure is a system that delivers compressed gas or fluid and controls the pressure and rate of pressure change to a desired target set-point.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.SystemsSubComponentTypes.PROCESS_POWER
member.summary: ProcessPower is an XML container that represents the information for a power source associated with a piece of equipment that supplies energy to the manufacturing process separate from the Electric system. For example, this could be the power source for an EDM machining process, an electroplating line, or a welding system.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.SystemsSubComponentTypes.PROTECTIVE
member.summary: Protective is an XML container that represents the information for those functions that detect or prevent harm or damage to equipment or personnel. Protective does not include the information relating to the Enclosure system.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.SystemsSubComponentTypes.VACUUM
member.summary: Vacuum is a system that evacuates gases and liquids from an enclosed and sealed space to a controlled negative pressure or a molecular density below the prevailing atmospheric level.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.ComponentTypes.SystemsSubComponentTypes.WORK_ENVELOPE
member.summary: WorkEnvelope organizes information about the physical process execution space within a piece of equipment. The WorkEnvelope MAY provide information regarding the physical workspace and the conditions within that workspace.

member.name: T:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.CompositionTypes
member.summary: Available types of sub-parts of a .
member.remarks: See Part 2 Section 6 of the MTConnect specification.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.CompositionTypes.ACTUATOR
member.summary: A mechanism for moving or controlling a mechanical part of a piece of equipment. It takes energy usually provided by air, electric current, or liquid and converts the energy into some kind of motion.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.CompositionTypes.AMPLIFIER
member.summary: An electronic component or circuit for amplifying power, electric current, or voltage

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.CompositionTypes.BALLSCREW
member.summary: A mechanical structure for transforming rotary motion into linear motion.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.CompositionTypes.BELT
member.summary: An endless flexible band used to transmit motion for a piece of equipment or to convey materials and objects.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.CompositionTypes.BRAKE
member.summary: A mechanism for slowing or stopping a moving object by the absorption or transfer of the energy of momentum, usually by means of friction, electrical force, or magnetic force.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.CompositionTypes.CHAIN
member.summary: An interconnected series of objects that band together and are used to transmit motion for a piece of equipment or to convey materials and objects.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.CompositionTypes.CHOPPER
member.summary: A mechanism used to break material into smaller pieces.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.CompositionTypes.CHUCK
member.summary: A mechanism that holds a part, stock material, or any other item in place.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.CompositionTypes.CHUTE
member.summary: An inclined channel for conveying material.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.CompositionTypes.CIRCUIT_BREAKER
member.summary: A mechanism for interrupting an electric circuit.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.CompositionTypes.CLAMP
member.summary: A mechanism used to strengthen, support, or fasten objects in place.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.CompositionTypes.COMPRESSOR
member.summary: A pump or other mechanism for reducing volume and increasing pressure of gases in order to condense the gases to drive pneumatically powered pieces of equipment.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.CompositionTypes.DOOR
member.summary: A mechanical mechanism or closure that can cover a physical access portal into a piece of equipment allowing or restricting access to other parts of the equipment.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.CompositionTypes.DRAIN
member.summary: A mechanism that allows material to flow for the purpose of drainage from, for example, a vessel or tank.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.CompositionTypes.ENCODER
member.summary: A mechanism used to measure rotary position.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.CompositionTypes.EXPIRED_POT
member.summary: A POT for a tool that is no longer useable for removal from a ToolMagazine or Turret.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.CompositionTypes.EXPOSURE_UNIT
member.summary: A mechanism for emitting a type of radiation

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.CompositionTypes.EXTRUSION_UNIT
member.summary: A mechanism for dispensing liquid or powered materials

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.CompositionTypes.FAN
member.summary: Any mechanism for producing a current of air.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.CompositionTypes.FILTER
member.summary: Any substance or structure through which liquids or gases are passed to remove suspended impurities or to recover solids.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.CompositionTypes.GALVANOMOTOR
member.summary: An electromechanical actuator that produces deflection of a beam of light or energy in response to electric current through its coil in a magnetic field.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.CompositionTypes.GRIPPER
member.summary: A mechanism that holds a part, stock material, or any other item in place.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.CompositionTypes.HOPPER
member.summary: A chamber or bin in which materials are stored temporarily, typically being filled through the top and dispensed through the bottom.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.CompositionTypes.LINEAR_POSITION_FEEDBACK
member.summary: A mechanism that measures linear motion or position.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.CompositionTypes.MOTOR
member.summary: A mechanism that converts electrical, pneumatic, or hydraulic energy into mechanical energy.

member.summary: subTypes of EVENT type

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.DataItemTypes.DirectionSubTypes.ROTARY
member.summary: The rotational direction of a rotary device using the right hand rule convention as defined in Appendix B. CLOCKWISE or COUNTER_CLOCKWISE

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.DataItemTypes.DirectionSubTypes.LINEAR
member.summary: The direction of motion of a linear device. POSTIVE or NEGATIVE

member.name: T:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.DataItemTypes.EndOfBarSubTypes
member.summary: subTypes of EVENT type

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.DataItemTypes.EndOfBarSubTypes.PRIMARY
member.summary: Specific applications MAY reference one or more locations on a piece of bar stock as the indication for the End_of_Bar. The main or most important location MUST be designated as the PRIMARY indication for the End_of_Bar. If no sub-type is specified, PRIMARY MUST be the default End_of_Bar indication.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.DataItemTypes.EndOfBarSubTypes.AUXILIARY
member.summary: When multiple locations on a piece of bar stock are referenced as the indication for the End_of_Bar, the additional location(s) MUST be designated as AUXILIARY indication(s) for the End_of_Bar.

member.name: T:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.DataItemTypes.EquipmentModeSubTypes
member.summary: subTypes of EVENT type

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.DataItemTypes.EquipmentModeSubTypes.LOADED
member.summary: An indication that the sub-parts of a piece of equipment are under load.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.DataItemTypes.EquipmentModeSubTypes.WORKING
member.summary: An indication that a piece of equipment is performing any activity – the equipment is active and performing a function under load or not.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.DataItemTypes.EquipmentModeSubTypes.OPERATING
member.summary: An indication that the major sub-parts of a piece of equipment are powered or performing any activity whether producing a part or product or not.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.DataItemTypes.EquipmentModeSubTypes.POWERED
member.summary: An indication that primary power is applied to the piece of equipment and, as a minimum, the controller or logic portion of the piece of equipment is powered and functioning or components that are required to remain on are powered.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.DataItemTypes.EquipmentModeSubTypes.DELAY
member.summary: An indication that a piece of equipment is waiting for an event or an action to occur.

member.name: T:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.DataItemTypes.EquipmentTimerSubTypes
member.summary: subTypes of SAMPLE type

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.DataItemTypes.EquipmentTimerSubTypes.LOADED
member.summary: Measurement of the time that the sub-parts of a piece of equipment are under load. Example: For traditional machine tools, this is a measurement of the time that the cutting tool is assumed to be engaged with the part.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.DataItemTypes.EquipmentTimerSubTypes.WORKING
member.summary: Measurement of the time that a piece o equipment is performing any activity – the equipment is active and performing a function under load or not. Example: For traditional machine tools, this includes LOADED, plus rapid moves, tool changes, etc.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.DataItemTypes.EquipmentTimerSubTypes.OPERATING
member.summary: Measurement of the time that the major sub-parts of a piece of equipment are powered or performing any activity whether producing a part or product or not. Example: For traditional machine tools, this includes WORKING, plus idle time.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.DataItemTypes.EquipmentTimerSubTypes.POWERED
member.summary: The measurement of time that primary power is applied to the piece of equipment and, as a minimum, the controller or logic portion of the piece of equipment is powered and functioning or components that are required to remain on are powered. Example: Heaters for an extrusion machine that are required to be powered even when the equipment is turned off.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.DataItemTypes.EquipmentTimerSubTypes.DELAY
member.summary: Measurement of the time that a piece o equipment is waiting for an event or an action to occur.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.DataItemTypes.EventTypes.ACTIVE_AXES
member.summary: The set of axes associated with a Path that the Controller is controlling. If DataItem is not provided, it will be assumed the Controller is controlling all axes.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.DataItemTypes.EventTypes.ACTUATOR_STATE
member.summary: The state of the Actuator - ACTIVE or INACTIVE.

member.summary: The originator’s software version of the Adapter.

member.summary: The URI of the Adapter.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.DataItemTypes.EventTypes.ALARM_LIMIT
member.summary: A set of limits used to trigger warning or alarm indicators.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.DataItemTypes.EventTypes.APPLICATION
member.summary: The application on a component.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.DataItemTypes.EventTypes.AVAILABILITY
member.summary: Represents the ability of a Component to communicate. This MUST be provided fo Device and MAY be provided for any other Component. AVAILABLE or UNAVAILABLE.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.DataItemTypes.EventTypes.AXIS_COUPLING
member.summary: Describes the way the axes will be associated to each other. This is used in conjunction with COUPLED_AXES to indicate the way they are interacting. The possible values are: TANDEM, SYNCHRONOUS, MASTER, and SLAVE. The coupling MUST be viewed from the perspective of the axis, therefore a MASTER coupling indicates that this axis is the master of the COUPLED_AXES.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.DataItemTypes.EventTypes.AXIS_FEEDRATE_OVERRIDE
member.summary: The value of a signal or calculation issued to adjust the feedrate of an individual linear type axis.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.DataItemTypes.EventTypes.AXIS_INTERLOCK
member.summary: An indicator of the state of the axis lockout function when power has been removed and the axis is allowed to move freely.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.DataItemTypes.EventTypes.AXIS_STATE
member.summary: An indicator of the controlled state of an Axis Subcomponent.

member.summary: The block of code being executed. Block contains the entire expression for a line of program code.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.DataItemTypes.EventTypes.BLOCK_COUNT
member.summary: The total count of the number of blocks of program code that have been executed since execution started.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.DataItemTypes.EventTypes.CHUCK_INTERLOCK
member.summary: An indication of the state of an interlock function or control logic state intended to prevent the associated CHUCK component from being operated.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.DataItemTypes.EventTypes.CHUCK_STATE
member.summary: An indication of the operating state of a mechanism t holds a part or stock material during a manufacturing process. It may also represent a mechanism that holds any other mechanism in place within a device.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.DataItemTypes.EventTypes.COMPOSITION_STATE
member.summary: An indication of the operating condition of a mechanism represented by a Composition type element.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.DataItemTypes.EventTypes.CONNECTION_STATUS
member.summary: The status of the connection between an Adapter and an Agent.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.DataItemTypes.EventTypes.CONTROL_LIMIT
member.summary: A set of limits used to indicate whether a process variable is stable and in control.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.DataItemTypes.EventTypes.CONTROLLER_MODE_OVERRIDE
member.summary: A setting or operator selection that changes the behavior of a piece of equipment.

member.summary: Refers to the set of associated axes. The value will be a space delimited set of axes names.

member.summary: The identifier of another piece of equipment that is temporarily associated with a component of this piece of equipment to perform a particular function.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.DataItemTypes.EventTypes.DIRECTION
member.summary: The direction of motion. CLOCKWISE or COUNTER_CLOCKWISE. See subTypes:

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.DataItemTypes.EventTypes.DOOR_STATE
member.summary: The direction of motion of a linear device. POSTIVE or NEGATIVE

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.DataItemTypes.EventTypes.END_OF_BAR
member.summary: An indication of whether the end of a piece of bar st being feed by a bar feeder has been reached.

member.summary: The current state of the emergency stop actuator. ARMED (the circuit is complete and the device is operating) or TRIGGERED (the circuit is open and the device MUST cease operation).

member.summary: The hardware of a component.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.DeviceRelationshipRoleTypes.SYSTEM
member.summary: The associated piece of equipment performs the functions of a System for this piece of equipment. In MTConnect, System provides utility type services to support the operation of a piece of equipment and these services are required for the operation of a piece of equipment.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.DeviceRelationshipRoleTypes.AUXILIARY
member.summary: The associated piece of equipment performs the functions as an Auxiliary for this piece of equipment. In MTConnect, Auxiliary extends the capabilities of a piece of equipment, but is not required for the equipment to function.

member.name: T:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Elements.ChannelElements
member.summary: Channel represents each sensing element connected to a sensor unit.
member.remarks: See Part 2 Section 9.1.3.1.2 of the MTConnect specification.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Elements.ChannelElements.DESCRIPTION
member.summary: An XML element that can contain any descriptive content. The CDATA of Description MAY include any additional descriptive information the implementer chooses to include regarding a sensor element.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Elements.ChannelElements.CALIBRATION_DATE
member.summary: Date upon which the sensor unit was last calibrated to the sensor element. The data value for CalibrationDate is provided in the CDATA for this element and MUST be represented in the W3C ISO 8601 format.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Elements.ChannelElements.NEXT_CALIBRATION_DATE
member.summary: Date upon which the sensor element is next scheduled to be calibrated with the sensor unit. The data value for NextCalibrationDate is provided in the CDATA for this element and MUST be represented in the W3C ISO 8601 format.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Elements.ChannelElements.CALIBRATION_INITIALS
member.summary: The initials of the person verifying the validity of the calibration data. The data value for CalibrationInitials is provided in the CDATA for this element and MAY be any numeric or text content.

member.name: T:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Elements.ComponentConfigurationElements
member.summary: Configuration contains technical information about a component describing its physical layout, functional characteristics, and relationships with other components within a piece of equipment.
member.remarks: See Part 2 Section 9 of the MTConnect specification

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Elements.ComponentConfigurationElements.COORDINATE_SYSTEMS
member.summary: CoordinateSystems aggregates CoordinateSystem configurations for a Component.
member.remarks: See Part 2 Section 9.4 of the MTConnect specification

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Elements.ComponentConfigurationElements.COORDINATE_SYSTEM
member.summary: A CoordinateSystem is a reference system that associates a unique set of n parameters with each point in an n-dimensional space. Ref: ISO 10303-218:2004
member.remarks: See Part 2 Section 9.4.1 of the MTConnect specification

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Elements.ComponentConfigurationElements.MOTION
member.summary: Motion defines the movement of the Component relative to a coordinate system.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Elements.ComponentConfigurationElements.RELATIONSHIPS
member.summary: Relationships is an XML container that organizes information defining the associ ation between pieces of equipment that function independently but together perform a manufacturing operation. Relationships may also define the association between components within a piece of equipment.
member.remarks: See Part 2 Section 9.2 of the MTConnect specification

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Elements.ComponentConfigurationElements.DEVICE_RELATIONSHIP
member.summary: DeviceRelationship describes the association between two pieces of equipment that function independently but together perform a manufacturing operation.
member.remarks: See Part 2 Section 9.2.1.1 of the MTConnect specification

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Elements.ComponentConfigurationElements.COMPONENT_RELATIONSHIP
member.summary: ComponentRelationship describes the association between two components within a piece of equipment that function independently but together perform a capability or service within a piece of equipment.
member.remarks: See Part 2 Section 9.2.1.2 of the MTConnect specification

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Elements.ComponentConfigurationElements.SENSOR_CONFIGURATION

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Elements.ComponentConfigurationElements.SOLID_MODEL

member.name: T:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Elements.DataItemElements
member.summary: Available elements for the element

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Elements.DataItemElements.SOURCE
member.summary: Source is an optional XML element that identifies the Component, DataItem, or Composition representing the area of the piece of equipment from which a measured value originates. Additionally, Source MAY provide information relating to the identity of a measured value. This information is reported as CDATA for Source. (example, a PLC tag)

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Elements.DataItemElements.CONSTRAINTS
member.summary: Constraints is an optional container that provides a set of expected values that can be reported for this DataItem. Constraints are used by a software application to evaluate the validity of the reported data.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Elements.DataItemElements.FILTERS
member.summary: An optional container for the Filter elements associated with this DataItem element.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Elements.DataItemElements.INITIAL_VALUE
member.summary: InitialValue is an optional XML element that defines the starting value for a data item as well as the value to be set for the data item after a reset event. Only one InitialValue element may be defined for a data item. The value will be constant and cannot change. If no InitialValue element is defined for a data item that is periodically reset, then the starting value for the data item MUST be a value of 0.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Elements.DataItemElements.RESET_TRIGGER
member.summary: ResetTrigger is an optional XML element that identifies the type of event that may cause a reset to occur. It is additional information regarding the meaning of the data that establishes an understanding of the time frame that the data represents so that the data may be correctly understood by a client software application.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Elements.DataItemElements.DEFINITION
member.summary: The Definition defines the meaning of Entry and Cell elements associated with the DataItem when the representation is either DATA_SET or TABLE.

member.summary: A fixed point from which measurement or motion commences.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Elements.MotionElements.TRANSFORMATION
member.summary: The Transformation of the parent Origin or Transformation using Translation and Rotation.

member.summary: A set of limits defining a range of values designating acceptable performance for a variable.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Elements.ProcessSpecificationElements.ALARM_LIMITS
member.summary: A set of limits used to trigger warning or alarm indicators.

member.name: T:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Elements.SensorConfigurationElements
member.summary: An element that can contain descriptive content defining the configuration information for Sensor. For Sensor, the valid configuration is SensorConfiguration which provides data from a subset of items commonly found in a transducer electronic data sheet for sensors and actuators called TEDS. TEDS formats are defined in IEEE 1451.0 and 1451.4 transducer interface standards (ref 15 and 16, respectively). MTConnect does not support all of the data represented in the TEDS data, nor does it duplicate the function of the TEDS data sheets.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Elements.SensorConfigurationElements.FIRMWARE_VERSION
member.summary: Version number for the sensor unit as specified by the manufacturer.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Elements.SensorConfigurationElements.CALIBRATION_DATE
member.summary: Date upon which the sensor unit was last calibrated.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Elements.SensorConfigurationElements.NEXT_CALIBRATION_DATE
member.summary: Date upon which the sensor unit is next scheduled to be calibrated.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Elements.SensorConfigurationElements.CALIBRATION_INITIALS
member.summary: The initials of the person verifying the validity of the calibration data.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Elements.SensorConfigurationElements.CHANNELS
member.summary: When Sensor represents multiple sensing elements, each sensing element is represented by a Channel for the Sensor.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Elements.SensorConfigurationElements.CHANNEL
member.summary: Channel represents each sensing element connected to a sensor unit.

member.summary: The SolidModel Scale is either a single multiplier applied to all three dimensions or a three space multiplier given in the X, Y, and Z dimensions in the coordinate system used for the SolidModel.

member.summary: Elements for a Transformation element in the MTConnect Response Document.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Elements.TransformationElements.TRANSLATION
member.summary: Translations along X, Y, and Z axes are expressed as x, y, and z respectively within a 3-dimensional vector. The values MUST be given in MILLIMETER_3D.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.Elements.TransformationElements.ROTATION
member.summary: Rotations about X, Y, and Z axes are expressed in A, B, and C respectively within a 3-dimensional vector. The values MUST be given in DEGREE_3D. Positive A, B, and C are in the directions to advance right-hand screws in the positive X, Y, and Z directions, respectively. Ref:ISO 9787:2013

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.RepresentationTypes.DATA_SET
member.summary: The reported value(s) are represented as a set of key-value pairs. Each reported value in the Data Set MUST have a unique key.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.RepresentationTypes.VALUE
member.summary: The measured value of a sample. If no representation is specified for a DataItem, the representation MUST be determined to be VALUE.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.RepresentationTypes.TABLE
member.summary: A Table is a two dimensional set of key-value pairs where the Entry represents a row, and the value is a set of key-value pair Cell elements. The Table follows the same behavior as the Data Set for change tracking, clearing, and history. When an Entry changes, all Cell elements update as a single unit following the behavior of a Data Set.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.RepresentationTypes.TIME_SERIES
member.summary: A series of sampled data. The data is collected for a specified number of samples and each sample is collected with a fixed period

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Devices.RepresentationTypes.DISCRETE
member.summary: A data type where each discrete occurrence of the data may have the same value as the previous occurrence of the data. There is no reported state change between occurrences of the data.

member.summary: Options for request paths against a MTConnect Agent.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.RequestTypes.PROBE
member.summary: An Agent responds to a Probe Request with an MTConnectDevices Response Document that contains the Equipment Metadata for pieces of equipment that are requested and currently represented in the Agent.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.RequestTypes.CURRENT
member.summary: An Agent responds to a Current Request with an MTConnectStreams Response Document that contains the current value of Data Entities associated with each piece of Streaming Data available from the Agent, subject to any filtering defined in the Request.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.RequestTypes.SAMPLE
member.summary: An Agent responds to a Sample Request with an MTConnectStreams Response Document that contains a set of values for Data Entities currently available for Streaming Data from the Agent, subject to any filtering defined in the Request.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.RequestTypes.ASSETS
member.summary: An Agent responds to an Asset Request with an MTConnectAssets Response Document that contains information for MTConnect Assets from the Agent, subject to any filtering defined in the Request.

member.name: F:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.RequestTypes.ASSET
member.summary: An Agent responds to an Asset Request with an MTConnectAssets Response Document that contains information for MTConnect Assets from the Agent, subject to any filtering defined in the Request.

member.name: P:MtconnectCore.Standard.SampleRequestQuery.Interval
member.summary: The Agent MUST continuously publish Response Documents when the query parameters include interval using the value as the minimum period between adjacent publications. See Part 1 Section 8.3.3.2 of MTConnect specification.

member.name: P:MtconnectCore.Standard.SampleRequestQuery.Heartbeat
member.summary: Sets the time period for the heartbeat function in an Agent.
